@using Markdig.Syntax.Inlines

<MudGrid>
    <MudItem xs="12" sm="12" md="6">
        <MudMarkdown Value="@markdown" TableCellMinWidth="100" OverrideLinkUrl="@OverrideLink" CodeBlockTheme="CodeBlockTheme.Vs" />
    </MudItem>
    <MudItem xs="12" sm="12" md="6">
        <MudTextField Label="Markdown" Variant="Variant.Outlined" @bind-Value="@markdown" Lines="5" DebounceInterval="100" />
    </MudItem>
</MudGrid>

@code
{

    string markdown = @"*From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia*

**Markdown** is a [lightweight markup language](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lightweight_markup_language) for creating [formatted text](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Formatted_text) using a [plain-text editor](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Text_editor).";

    public string OverrideLink(LinkInline link)
    {
        // here you can change the url that should be navigated to
        return link.Url;
    }
}
